meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rick Terpstra Ian Flynn Burt Westermeier Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7814.

td.p: Rick Terpstra, an aspiring English teacher from Havertown, Pennsylvania
Ian Flynn, a copy editor from Portsmouth, New Hampshire
Burt Westermeier, a Ph.D. candidate from New Haven, Connecticut (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,401)

tr.td: FOR ME & MY GAL GADOT
SAINTS ON EARTH
(Alex: We want you to correct the name which has an incorrect spelling. It has an "S" that doesn't belong at the end...)
NO S ENDING!
POTPOURRI
ANTI UP
DEAL THE CARDS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
